link.description: The training manual (originally developed in Cameroon) has been revised for version  9.3. This website currently has versions 9.2 and 9.3 in both English and French. It also includes PDF files to download for printing if desired. It follows the six stages of the translation process covering most of the tasks in the SIL compact plan. Modules can be selected for various training courses or it can also be used as self-study.
